sentences.en: " Mathematics " is sometimes abbreviated to " math ".
a set of simple math problems
Anyway, you're too slow and your math stinks.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说, 你太慢了,而你的数学又一团糟.

sentences.en: But you had to be good at math.
Dad said he'd see about the math teacher's unreasonable cruelty.
sentences.cn: 爸说他会料理数学老师不合理的残忍行为.
他上大学时专业是数学。

sentences.en: He was reading a math textbook in the library.
sentences.cn: 他在图书馆看一本数学教科书.

sentences.en: I am especially by math problems.
sentences.cn: 我对数学问题特别感兴趣.

sentences.en: I flunked math in second grade.
sentences.cn: 我二年级时数学不及格。

sentences.en: Jonny's report card points up his talent for math.
sentences.cn: 约翰尼的成绩单上突出了他的数学才能.

sentences.en: She’s learning calculus in math class.
The four operations are the basis of math.
sentences.cn: 四则运算是数学的基础.

sentences.en: The hard math problem tripped up most of the students.
sentences.cn: 这道数学难题难倒了大多数学生.

sentences.en: The report card points up his talent for math.
sentences.cn: 这份成绩单显示了他的数学才能.

sentences.en: They have worked out all the math problems by themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们已独立地将这些数学题目全部解出来了.

sentences.en: Those math problems made me dizzy.
sentences.cn: 那些数学题弄得我晕头转向.

sentences.en: Tim’s good at math and science.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆的数学和自然科学很好。

words.tran_cn: 数学的，数学上的；精确的
